content.detailedDescription: I was leaving my fiance���s house around 11:30 pm on the 22nd of may, 2011. his house is essentially in the middle of nowhere and is surrounded by corn fields. on a clear night, you can see every star in the pitch black sky, as it is void of air pollution and smog. tonight, however, we are expecting serious storm systems so the sky was extremely cloudy and overcast. dark grey clouds blocked any stars or airplanes in the sky. however, looking to the eastern part of the sky, i noticed a vibrantly glowing orange light hovering in the air. having avid interest in ufos, i pointed it out to my fiance, asking him if there was a streetlight or radio tower in that area. he quickly brushed off these possibilities, as his house is surrounded by farmland as i mentioned. we stood staring at the ufo. it hung stationary in the sky, glowing a bright orange. it didn���t waver like an airplane- in fact, it didn���t move whatsoever. the object was very still. it seemed to flash a little bit of red in the lower right corner.  for the most part, it was entirely orange- a very vibrant orange. the ufo captivated us since it stood out so sharply against the cloud-covered sky. i cannot emphasize this enough. [i took careful note on my drive home- i couldn���t even see any airplanes against the heavy cloud coverage.] after about 2 minutes of observation, the orange object began to get smaller and smaller before it disappeared. needless to say, i was very anxious on my drive home (and still am).
content.summary: Vibrant, stationary orange object hovering in sky

content.detailedDescription:
Sitting out side looking up at the hills in front yard, looking to my right about 10  o clock high, it moved right to left. then stopped in mid air then toward me then left again. stopped. mid air again no noise.  drifted to the left,,
 this is when i ran inside the house to get my wife, so she could see the object. when we both got outside about 20 seconds later it drifted away a little then stopped again in mid air.  then drifted away then stopped again mid air. when i first saw the object, i though maybe a small air craft, but no noise then as it got closer ,, no way was it a small palne, because it stopped in its tracks. then i noticed it was disc shapped wide disc though from top to bottom. thicker looking. right away i knew it wasn't a plane as it got closer,  it was as big as a sliver dollar if you were extend your hand full length,, compared to the hills it looked about at least forty to fifty feet across when i first saw it. 
it was white not fuzzy looking, but a real solid object, on the right side in the middle of the object. it had what looked like port holes slits on the right side of the object.  whith a black solid line on the left side of the going through about half way to the middle of the oject.
it moved very smoothly. up and down then side to side then away smoothly.
it moved away until it wasn't visable again. it was awesome to look at, some how i felt an attraction to it, i was not scared, i wanted it to come back like feeling. there was black clouds in the back ground , still light out side, thats what was nice about it because it was very white solid object with the black clouds in the back drop of sighting.
*(wit's name deleted--cms/sg).
content.summary: Hovered about 10  oclock high right to left near hillside, hillside on the left side probably about 150 to 200 yards away. then silently still in the sky. drifted to left then stopped, then left again, then away out of sight then

content.detailedDescription: Myself and my girlfriend, trish, were out front of our house in the garage as we were preparing to move and loading a trailer for the morning when we noticed two star sized objects that were obviously not airplanes. the first flew from the south (tucson) in a northern direction, not in a direct flight pattern, appeared to be weaving through stars, and was the same size as the stars. the object was flying at a high rate of speed and when it first came into view it was as bright as the other stars and then diminished as though it was no longer flying in our atmosphere. the second object appeared to be the same size and brightness as the first, occurring seconds after the first diminished, and came into view flying from the southwest to the same location in the north the first object had flown. the second object also appeared bright, star sized, and flew in a simmilar random star weaving pattern as the first then diminished in brightness as though it was no longer in our atmosphere. the sighting lasted approximately 3.5 minutes at 20:35 hours on 05/22/2011.
content.summary: Flying above atmosphere, star sized, extremely fast, effortless direction change

content.detailedDescription: Was going out to walk the dog. looked up at the stars (it's pretty clear out) and noticed 8 yellow lights hovering in a triangular shape. checked cell phone-- 9:15pm est. lasted till about 9:20. wasn't scared only mildly curious. object zinged away very quickly.
content.summary: 8 yellow lights triangular shape

content.detailedDescription: I was sitting in my front lawn when i saw a few lights in the sky. i dismissed it as a plane, but then it began to hover. it hovered for 2 minutes then zipped off at an incredible speed. it was very confusing at the time, i'm still not sure if i believe what happened.
content.summary: Triangle with 8 yellow lights

content.detailedDescription: I was outside looking at the sky, thats when i saw something big it was bigger than a commercial plane. the thing in the outside looked green like if it was a force field the inside was like yellow orange it was moving so fast but it didnt make any noise after that it look like shooting star was follwing it. after that i my experince with sleep paralysis is getting worse.  i get scared at night. i always see this thing it has red eyes and its color its like yellow orange. it is tall and skinny well you can say thick. i been triying to get help people think that im loosing my mind but im not. this bird comes to my window often at night, thats when i start to have sleep paralysis and i feel like im being dragged, but when i do manage to wake up i feel like there is somebody in the room with me
content.summary: It was like a bright star it was green on the outside,yellow orange it was moving so fast i thought it was going to hit the ground it was followed what look like a shooting star

content.detailedDescription: I was in birmingham on vacation with my family, and suddenly i saw a triangle  of multiple flashing lights, it looked to be heading north, but it sort of just slid across the sky, it didn't look to be flying, just sort of slowly gliding. i told my wife to look but she couldn't see it. i had looked away to tell her to look more carefully, but when i looked back i couldn't see it anymore. i think i might have been seeing things, but i figure it's worth reporting. i've attached a picture of what i remember seeing.
content.summary: Triangular formation, multiple flashing lights.

content.detailedDescription: Me and my friends were hiking up a popular trail in our community, mt. umunhum. we sat down to take a drink and eat the 3 bagels i had packed, i updated my facebook status from the spot using location, so my location at this time was (37.16373,-121.898511). i had finished my food when i looked up at our subsequent destination through a clearing of trees, that's when i saw a large shadow covering the monument on top of the mountain, i wondered, "what on earth could make such a big shadow?". so i sprinted a few yards ahead onto a rock to get a better view, initially i didn't see it, but i soon began to make out a triangle or square in the sky through connecting these hovering lights. there were around 9 lights that were arranged in a triangular or square way, the lights were yellow. they cast a shadow all the way across the peak, then shimmered away. by this time my friends had walked to me and seen it too.
content.summary: While taking a hike, i saw a triangle of 8 lights in the sky above mt. umunhum.

content.detailedDescription:
I was playing in the garden with my brother when he suddenly began to stare at the sky, when i do the same woahh ���no mames qu��� es eso! i exclaimed.

at first, i thought that things were many planes flying together, but no! it was a triangle, a very large triangle (like 20m^2). it was like floating but it doesn't move very much. i was amazed, that triangle stayed like one hour only floating, i stared and stared and my brother said me that he was scared, so i hugged him and said him that all will go well.

suddenly that enormous triangle dissapeared.
content.summary: Like a triangle of yellow lights.

content.detailedDescription:
The nighe in question was very clear no cloud no sound of thunder i was looking at the stars all were visible i was stood in the back garden looking at the stars in front of me there is a house about 40ft away.I saw a large white ball just show up about 30ft above the house no sound then drop 15ft to a small whie ball there was a trail of light between the to balls only for a second or two then the whole thing was gone.
when the first ball appeard it did not drop from the sky it just appeard above the house out of nowhere then drop like i have said to a smaller ball it was very fast no sound non what so ever it was a quiet night please help its going over and over in my mind thank you
content.summary: One sphere then a small sphere 30ft of the gruond

content.detailedDescription: I went out camping with my best friend for the weekend. it was just starting to get dark and we were taking our dirt bikes out for one last run when my friend pulled over to the side of the trail and waved back at me to get me to stop. when i took off my helmet and asked what was wrong she told me her engine had kicked out, which is really weird because her bike is less than a year old. as she tried to kick start her bike i saw her frown and point to the sky ahead of us (eastern sky) and didn't say a word. we both saw the same thing. nine or ten lights were glowing bright yellow, connected in a triangular pattern. at first i thought maybe it was a cell phone tower or maybe lights from town, but we were facing away from the nearest town and towards the desert and the longer we watched it, we saw that it was rotating in a slow circle as it moved across the horizon. the distance was hard to judge and i almost thought we were seeing a smaller object nearer to us but one of the tips disappeared beyond the mountain as it spiraled past it; giving me the impression of it being massive in size. once i got a scope of its sheer size, i sat on my bike with my mouth open and staring in shock, thinking about trying to get closer for a better sight. by the time i worked out that it didn't resemble any aircraft i've ever seen, the lights intensified and the whole shape vanished behind the mountaintop. i started to speak and was interrupted by what sounded like the belated boom from a jet after it passes you and i can only assume the two were related. i don't know if i say aliens or experimental military craft or what, but i know i saw something. also, my friends bike is still messed up... don't know if those are connected.
content.summary: It looked like ten or less yellow lights arranged in a triangle.

content.detailedDescription:
At approximately 5:13 am, morning of may 22 2011, i along with my cousin witnessed what i believe to be a ufo over the city of karachi in pakistan; i will mention any differences in our observations. we were sitting on the balcony of his house my cousin noticed a moving object in the sky, but did not mention, only after he noticed its strange shape and ���flight style��� did he point it out to me. i confirmed to him that i could see the object, it looked strange to me as well, not a plane or anything similar. the object was in a triangular shaped, made up of 8 lights. he tells me that he counted 9 lights. the lights were yellow in color, apart from the lights, there was no defined shape that i could see, partly because of the slight clouds in the sky, and ���light pollution���. the object was flying, but not in a conventionally way, that is to say as an aircraft flies, it was definitely moving, but at a slower speed, it was within our view for about 3 minutes or so before it was obscured by a building.

we do not undertake in any sorts of drugs or hallucinogenics and are of sound mind. my cousin does not believe in extraterrestrial life, i am open to the possibility and am very interested, this is the first time i have ever witnessed something like this. my cousin was dismissive, whereas i was more intrigued by this, it made me feel excited, as it was obviously not something normal.
content.summary: Trinagular object - 8 yellow lights flying in sky.

content.detailedDescription: It was a bright, hovering, flashing triangle. it made a humming noise that was very loud.
content.summary: Yellow flashing triangle hovering ufo

content.detailedDescription:
I just saw it from my balcony. 
estimated size about 10 meters. 
continuesly accelerating and decelerating while moving in a circular path. it emmits a very low frequency ,almost subsonic, noise. 
many people now are observing from the street. 
even some cars stopped and drivers exited to observe it better.
took some photos with mobile phone.
 i'm little scared. don't know if it's safe to observe and what may happen next. 
will try to take more photos and upload as soon as possible
content.summary: Triangular equilateral with 7 orange lights and glowing yellowish

content.detailedDescription:
My last ufo.
i went outside to my back garden as i heard my dog barking. told him to calm down and to come in but he was looking up when he was barking. i looked and saw a tree but as i looked more closely to my dogs eyes, i noticed he was looking up in the sky and that is when i saw it.
it was bright, started off flashing different colours and must of been there for at 3 minutes. my feelings at the time was that it could be a plane or helicopter but have seen then before in the dark and this was no plane or helicopter i had seen before. it went from flashing green to yellow to blue. then there was a flash and it had just disappeared. have seen more in the last few years and have took some photos. my name is (*wit's name deleted--cms/sg)by the way and i'm a beginner ufologist and my email is *(wit's email address deleted--cms/sg) in case anybody wants to talk about it.
content.summary: Seen 3 ufos in past 3 years

content.detailedDescription: About 3,15 pm local time, i was outside with a couple of friends, i saw an unidentified objet at north, it was a triangular objects with light above i stood still for about 7 minutes and the just disappeared. i first thought it was an airplane but i stood still and i noticed it was no airplane
content.summary: Ufo seen over salta city on may 22, 2011, triangle with lights

content.detailedDescription: My mother, sister, and i were hanging out on back patio and my  mom says "what is that?". and that is when we all looked at this thing is the sky, a silver disc with a hole in the middle. it was at first not very far off the ground maybe a couple hundred feet in air. it looked as though it was gliding or caught in a wind current like birds get. my mom and i told *(name deleted--cms/sg), my sister, to get her iphone. but we were in shock i guess. she finally gets phone and i notice it is moving towards front of house so we run through house while videoing. we can see the disc with our eyes that it has risen but the iphone did not pick up the image. you can hear me saying there it is! but you see nothing on the screen. we have no idea what this was. but i have never seen anything like this before.
content.summary: Silver, hole in the middle

content.detailedDescription:
I saw a light in the sky that picked my attention.  
i grabed my camera and i just zoomed at for a better closeup whith my reflex camera.I was  suprised  by the sharpeness of the sphere.
im still not shure if my camera gave me the correct reality or it is only an illution by the lense. but when i zoomed out it was still round and bright hovering slowly. i just called my wife to take a look and when i turned to the  window  the object was gone. 

i took a hd video of the event but it is 148mb and 71mb so i cant attach the video but i took some printscreens of it.
content.summary: Orange fireball slowly hovering over the forest

content.detailedDescription: Was playing frisbee outside, looked up and saw a star like object moving quickly at a high altitude, object's light grew in illumination, much brighter than any other stars, then dims and cant be seen, no strobing lights could be seen, sighting lasting approximately 15 seconds
content.summary: Star like object burns intensely then leaves

content.detailedDescription:
I just wanted to check in and say that the sightings haven't stopped. every night. we've got fake stars, fake planes, and sometimes what appears to be fake planets in the night sky. these crafts are crafty. they can mimic anything they want. but there are ways to distiguish a faker from the actual thing. take the fake planes for example - they appear in multiples, their lights are usually out of the correct arrangement and are flashing erradically, they usually don't project any sound, and they can do extraordinary things. if you go onto websites such as helloflight.Com, you can check some of the commercial airflights in the area. i try to do this before i go out so i can try to have somewhat of an idea of how many planes are in my area. usually, there are less than a handful at any given time. when the investigators came over to investigate, i stood there and counted a dozen of these fakers in the sky along with a cigar-shaped bright glowing one stationed above the horizon in the distance. the investigators dismissed these craft as merely airplanes, which disappointed me. and they kept ignoring me completely when i tried to point things out to them! we don't live near any major airports. the nearest airport was a private one & during the time of the investigation (which i think was in november or december), there isn't half as much activity because there is no need for farmers to be flying their crop dusters. i'll be honest, i felt mocked the entire time the investigators came out for the field investigation. all other times were fine - such as the interview and the phone calls, they were really nice. so it really came as a shock to me. the two other witnesses were offended by the behavior as well. especially when one of them ripped the binoculars out of my mom's hand when she tried to point out something strange in the sky.

i don't know if they were intentionally behaving this way or what the deal was, but that's why i haven't reported since.

i was told that there was going to be video equipment set up, including nightvision, et cetera. all they brought was a flashlight, binoculars, and a star tracking device that they just couldn't 'figure out'.

what i've noticed, in abundance lately, are the amber/fireball-like orbs. they like to appear in the same areas nightly, for whatever reason, and if you get close enough to them, you can watch them transform from a stationary red-orange orb and change into either a fake airplane or some other strange aircraft. once they notice that you notice, they will follow you. i believe that these orbs are doing something to the planet & i would like to believe that it is for the benifit of the planet. in all my adventures, i have received no harm from whatever occupies these crafts.

strange markings have showed up on my spine since january. they look like the typical scoop marks that you see in other cases. one of them is still very red, though it's been there for months now. it looks like some sort of punch biopsy, to be honest. i have pictures. i will send them upon request. i also have lots and lots and lots of video footage, and have created a channel on youtube to share what i've seen. that, too, will be available upon request. additionally, i've also had strange languages spoken to me in my dreams. a particular phrase in general. it's been burned into my brain. i don't know what language it is, and i don't know what it means. but the moment i heard it, i was awakened, and i knew i had to record it. this recording is also on my youtube channel. the language sounds ancient or native. some have said that they thought it was either hopi or mayan. which makes it even stranger. the phrase sounds like this: oot sah uwah, uwah a ki. short, but very specific-sounding. i think it's important.

memories from my childhood (and my sister's as well) have been surfacing & i don't know when i even realize that it's a memory because it's very foggy and very confusing (almost like a dream). i believe i was abducted at the age of 12 (along with my little sister and about a dozen other people) while out at summit lake. we were all getting ready for bed in our tents when someone told us to come outside and look at these strange lights hovering over the lake. they were the same cigar-shaped objects that appeared when the investigators were out here for a field session. but there were 6 or 7 of them. i remember them approaching us and i remember a flash of bright white light as we all stood there in awe. and that's where it ends. i don't recall ever going to bed that night. when i 'woke up' in the morning i felt very groggy. almost as if i had a hangover (but i was 12 and hadn't had a drink in my life at that point). i remember wondering what happened to the strange lights in the sky the night before and i remember wondering why no one else was bringing it up. i didn't remember that i didn't remember going to bed. which is the weirdest part of the entire thing. as soon as i entertained those thoughts, they vanished from my mind. and i never thought about it again until a few months ago when vague impressions of this memory started to trickle in.

i'm not sure if these memories or real or if the information is correct. i'm not sure of much anymore. 

and this is all just the tip of the iceberg. i could go on and on about this. about my experiences. to be truthful, i could write a book! i sometimes wonder if that's what this is all about. is that my purpose in all of this? i can't help but feel i have some sort of purpose, some sort of task that i'm supposed to do.

i mean no offense to the investigators that were on my case earlier, but i would prefer to be contacted (through email - heathermsilvey@gmail.Com) by someone different. in order to realize what's going on here, you need to open your mind. these things are masters of disguise. we've been invaded - whether that's hostile or not remains to be seen. 

i worry and wonder about the government's involvement. it makes me hesitant to even share this information. but i can't live in fear and i won't.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering,Other
content.shape: Cigar,   Circle,   Cylinder,   Disc,   Egg,   Fireball,   Flash,   Oval,   Sphere,   Star-like,   Triangle,   Other,   Unknown
content.summary: Ufos nightly & possible abductions

content.detailedDescription: At 10:50 three objects came into my sight from a distance of 20 miles away or more. they must have been beyond the coast line, possibly over the pacific ocean as i observed them facing due west/northwest from the city of ojai. initially i thought all three to be airplanes and observed the third object cross my field of vision (consistent with airplane flight) while the other two stopped and maintained there position at an identical altitude, hovering for 45 minutes. during the 45 minutes they were observed moving straight up, down and left/right. these movements are inconsistent with maneuverability of traditional aircraft. at 11:20 one of the crafts seemed to diminish in size while still keeping the same altitude as the other craft. i believe it was flying away from me or out to sea in this case. at 11:30 the remaining craft descended slowly straight down until it was out of my field of vision. i attempted to film and photograph but was unable due to there distance. i would describe the objects as orbs or disks. unfortunately from the distance i am unclear as to which. the put off a orange light and moved in a way as i can only describe as fluid in any direction. my feeling during the sighting was one of sheer joy and amazement.
content.summary: Witnessed two ufos approximately 20 miles north west of ojai. they maintained identical altitude 45minutes.

content.detailedDescription: This sighting happened back in 88, about a year after i graduated. me, and a friend of mine were out driving around, got a coke and burger, noticed a very intense thunder storm cell to the northeast. it was intence, lightening every second. more intense than most. rarely does storms come in from this direction, but, as we watched for awhile, it seemed to be moving toward roswell. we were kinda looking for something to do. it was getting close to sundown. so, we decided to drive out about 10 miles to the east of roswell where there are some small mountains overlooking the city, close to the pecos river. everyone calls this place the overlook. we parked, facing the storm, which was very close, still intence. the sun had just went down, and it was kinda getting dark. the storm wasnt like super huge or anything. kinda like a super, mini cell. it was butifull to watch. no, we werent drinking or doing drugs, thats something i never got into. the winds started picking up as it got closer. we could here a constant rumbling of thunder. the clouds were like rippled, and very low. we were kinda getting nervous, and were talking about getting out of there when i noticed a light dip out from the low rippled clouds. it just sat there for around 30 seconds. i told my friend to look. he seen it too just before it went back up into the cloud. it surely wasnt an airplane, because it wasnt moving. it then dipped back down again, again stopping just below the clouds, then, a few seconds later, a second light dipped out. this one was close to the first one. my friend tried getting a picture, but, only had a cheap regular camera, and of coarse nothing came out. about a minute later, the first light goes back up, followed closely by the second. the winds were blowing like crazy, as it started sprinkling. we braved it out, hoping to see more of the objects, wondering what they were. if they were manmade we thought, it would have had to been helicopters. but, i just couldnt imagine helicopters hovering in an intense thunderstorm like this one. i dont know much about helicopters. but, if they sometimes do things like this, then, maybe it was just helicopters. i just find it hard to believe, with all the lightening and winds. only other idea i have, is that it might have been ball lightening. but, i dont give that much credit either. the lights seemed to be inteligently controlled, dipping to a certain point, then going back up. kinda like playing peek a boo. anyway, im putting this down, kinda interested in other points of views on what they might have been, and, wondering if anyone else has ever seen anything like this. one last thing, might be strange, might not. but, the storm seemed to change directions, right when it got to the edge of where we were. it slowly drifted back east, going the oposite direction of roswell......
content.summary: Ufo dipping out from under storm cloud.

content.detailedDescription:
I was outside with my dogs at about 10:30 pm. i had my my night vision binoculars looking at the night sky. i saw an airplane (with the flashing lights) in the southern sky and in front of it at a close distance (maybe 1/2in looking through the binoculars, was a bright white orb flying at the same speed. my grandson and i watched it for maybe 2 minutes and then is just dimmed
slightly and  dissapeared. the plane seemed to slow just a little and kept on flying. they were traveling south to east.
i was very excited as i had seen ufo's like this at james gillilands ranch in troutlake wa.
content.summary: Airplane was following white orb

content.detailedDescription:
Coming home from work east on michigan ave. in canton @ approx. 2a on 2/10/11 i turned onto haggerty off michigan ave & saw a low flying craft gliding   across the i-275 expressway more slowly than normal aircraft in a southwesterly arc & watched it as it flew directly over my car, trying to discern whether it had wings. there were none, instead i made out a triangular shape, & there were large white lights @ each corner & a smaller red light @ tne bottom of the triangle just in front of the two lights in back. the craft was huge.
i drove on trying to make sense of what i'd just seen.

the next morning (2/11/11)@ approximately 3a as i approached the same intersection, i noticed 3 lights side by side drifting downward at a angle over michigan ave. approx. a mile in front of me. i thought it was a plane @ 1st, but because of the sighting the previous a.M., i focused on it as it moved toward the tree line running along mich.Ave. the closer i got the more i realized it wasn't advancing, but stationary, which really struck me.

it was hovering above the trees directly across from a large gas station which was brightly lit. it was just @ the n.W. corner of michigan ave. & haggerty. it was huge, i'm guessing close to 150 feet long, one light in front, two in back. as i was the only car on the road for a few minutes, i was able to drive by slowly & stare @ the craft for roughly half a minute, awestruck, even mildly stunned. it just sat there in the air about 100 feet above the trees, which showed no sign of movement, no disruption as if by downward air pressure for example. as i made the turn to go north on haggerty toward home, it took off on a straight trajectory following the tree line so smoothly i took note of that fact, as it indicated no impetus, no jerkiness or sign of propulsion. on both occasions,the craft made absolutely no sound. just after making the turn onto haggerty i decided to turn back & follow it.
but by the time i got back onto michigan ave. west it was gone.

then on 3/14/11, having been watching the skies in the area more closely than before, & i've been watching most of my life, i caught sight of the three side by side lights as i drove west to ypsilanti on my way to work @ approx. 9:30p just to my left from the i-94 expressway & kept looking back & forth watching the road & looking toward the craft hovering over ford lake. as i got off the freeway, i looked back to see it moving eastward, then lost sight of it, as i accessed the road to work.
content.summary: Hovered over trees @ intersection & more-see details below

content.detailedDescription: let me start by saying, this event occured only an hour and thirty five minutes ago. at 9:05 this evening my self , my friend bob, and friend geary wer siting in bobs back yard. bob got up, walked int the house and as geary was talking to me i looked up and saw what i believed to be 20 or 25 blue strobing lights, all flying at the same speed in a loose (disorganized formation ?). i jumed up and yelled look,look,look,look!Geary swung around and said " what the **** is that". i did'nt answer him. he then tried to convince me ( and himself ) that they were geese flying north with thier flapping wings being illuminated by the sun, wich was well below the horizon by then. there were plenty of visabe stars in the sky to contrast with these objects.The group was obscured by trees for 8 to 10 seconds and then reapeared. i yelled at bob " bob! get out here now!" as he caught view for only for the last 10 seconds before the objects were to hard to see in the northwestern twilight. this event was fallowed 5 to 6 minutes later with a series of bright quick flashes from the north. between ten and fifteen flashes over a perion of about 10 minutes.
content.summary: Between 15 or 20  strobing circular objects moving south to north at high altitude, no audible sound fallowed several minutes lated by 10 or 11 bright flashes in the nothern sky

content.detailedDescription: Driving southbound into iowa city just over interstate 80. about a mile or so away at approximately a 60 degree angle a small silver dot hung stable for around ten seconds with absolutely no movement. it did not resemble an airplane or any other reflective object such as a balloon. after ten seconds, the circular dot, half the size of a #2 pencil eraser, just blinked out of site (or possibly faded rapidly). i was surprised by its immediate disappearance, looking for contrails or any other sign of reflection pointing to an aircraft maybe switching direction. the weather was perfect with blue skies.
content.summary: Tiny silver circular dot. no movement for about ten seconds before disappearing in same location.

content.detailedDescription: Me and 2 friends were driving home when we saw lights in the sky from the front windshield.  there were 2 circular lights going around in a pretty big circle.  one light was blue one light was red.  it was like a light made from a laser, and not a flash light.  then after a short moment, they split up and sort of wandered around, at least one of them was.  then the lights started changing colors to maybe like an orange color and then back to a blueish light.  thats when they got together side by side and took off.  they kept going higher and higher then disappeared.  when i first saw i thought it was light from like a grand opening, a big event or something.  then i thought it might be a jet.  but those thoughts quickly went away and i knew i was looking at a ufo.  i used to watch a lot of ufo shows, and these lights i dont know how someone can explain.  it was going in a big circle like it was one object, then they flew on their own.  they flew pretty far away from eachother, got back together and flew upwards.  at first i was looking at the lights in the front windshield, then the side window, and then the back because we were driving.  i got a little video while in the back seat but the car was moving and i was more interested in seeing it than capturing it on video.  not the best video, but maybe it can help and hopefully someone in the area reported this incident or happened to record a better video.
content.summary: Red light and blue light going in a circle then split up and wandered around then went upwards

content.detailedDescription: Glowing star like object. orange white glow, up in sky. then it turned red and dropped a smaller white object towards the ground. both objects disappeared after the white object dropped
content.summary: Glowing object in sky dropped another smaller glowing object.

content.detailedDescription: On the evening of 4-22-11 at 9:17 pm, myself and two others were at hillside cemetery in reno nevada taking pictures trying capture ghost orbs during a ghost hunt.  in the picture provided, it struck me that ghost orbs can have striking similarities with ufo shapes.  i noticed how the orbs seems to be aligned in a flying formation and had holes in the middle of them, much like the ufo video that nasa took of ufo's floating in orbit around the copper electrodynamic tether that was released from the shuttle after the experiment years ago.  i was wondering if these ghost orbs have any connection with ufo's? instead of photographing ghost orbs, are we actually seeing ufo's capture by our camera?  i was wondering if anyone else out there has seen anything like this, or thinks there is a connection to these two phenomena?  please study the photo provided and see what you think.
content.summary: Ghost orbs/ufo's

content.detailedDescription: We were sitting on our 2nd story balcony which faces west. i looked up and saw a white light that was moving rapidly back and forth and got my husband to look up. it changed from white to blue a couple times and then it stayed blue. we couldn't see it the whole time due to trees and houses but it would pop out from behind them and zig zag. it would also go up and down. it was moving to quickly to be some kind of plane and it was pretty bright. we watched it for about 20 minutes before we went up a flight of stairs to the third floor landing of our building and could see it much better however shortly after that it didn't come out anymore. it was near bear creek lake park or possibly bandimere speedway.
content.summary: Blue light in sky
